WorkItem.Description: In Rawr.Bear, if you manage to compose a configuration(gear+buffs) where a tank is immune to melee (dodge + miss > 100%), the "Mitigation Points" value becomes negative. Probably the code computes that value with something like "x/(1-(miss+dodge))". There should be a check and something like "Infinite" should appear instead. It affects "Overall Points" and "Damage taken" too.
WorkItem.Summary: [Bear] Mitigation is wrong for melee immune tanks

Comments.Message: I'm not able to repro this; it does goto Infinity for me. Can you provide an example character file?

This character file gives:
- Damage Taken: -0.0611987%
- Overall Points: -1.133598E+07
- Mitigation Points: -1.143815E+07

You can also reproduce this by loading the same char from armory(if it has tank gear on), and putting all the dodge/agility buffs possible until the combat table contains only dodge and miss.
